thread.title: PM accorded warm welcome in Kuwait

title: PM accorded warm welcome in Kuwait
text:
PM accorded warm welcome in Kuwait | 0 0 
KUWAIT: Prime Minister Muhammad Nawaz Sharif was accorded a warm welcome when he arrived here Tuesday at the Bayan Palace to hold wide ranging talks with the leadership of Kuwait. 
Sheikh Jaber Al-Mubarak Al-Hamad Al Sabah, the Prime Minister of State of Kuwait greeted the prime minister. 
National anthems of the two countries were played. The contingent of the Kuwaiti Armed forces presented PM Nawaz salute. 
Later the two leaders introduced members of their respective delegations and proceeded for formal round of talks. The Prime Minister is on a two-day official visit to Kuwait. 0 0 PM accorded warm welcome in Kuwait   Latest Geo News, Latest Pakistan News, Pakistan Kuwait, Nawaz Sharif, Bayan Palace, . Permanent   "PM accorded warm welcome in Kuwait" is https://www.geo.tv/latest/133491-PM-accorded-warm-welcome-in-Kuwait
